content: Could you kindly furnish me with a comprehensive JSON dataset containing detailed information about all the characters featured in J.K. Rowling's renowned literary work, "Harry Potter and The Chamber of Secrets"? The dataset should encompass the character's name, age, gender, house, wand type, and pet's name. Moreover, I would appreciate it if you could categorize each character based on their age group (child, teenager, adult), house type (Gryffindor, Slytherin, Hufflepuff, Ravenclaw), and pet type. Additionally, I would be grateful if you could also provide me with the total number of characters in the book, along with the specific number of characters falling under each age group, house type, and pet type. Your prompt response would be highly appreciated.
